full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/26/2023 Joint Voluntary Agency Representative/KENYA UNITED STATES REFUGEE RESETTLEMENT PROGRAMME NEW NUMBERS:- P.O. Box 14176 FAYED Office: Tel: 440150-440153 NAIROBI, Kenya MAUA CLOSE Tel. 745311; 743032; 743493 WESTLANDS Fax: 441922 Administered through Church World Service Fax 254-2-742035 FACSIMILE This Fax Transmission consists of pages including this cover sheet. If all pages are not received, please contact us by Fax No. (254/742035) RDC DECEMBER 06, 1995 TO: DATE: ATTN: KATHY BAISDEN FAX: 212-979-8149 PAMELA HUTCHING$ FM: smole RE: CASES IN ETHIOPIA The following cases had some of their relatives denied under Section 212 (a) (1) (A) (i) of INA when medicals were done in Addis Ababa in June, 1995. The HIV antibody screening using Sanofi method showed positive and the Western Blot confirmation test facility was not available in Addis Ababa at that time. The Western Blot method was recently availed in Addis Ababa and 12 out of the 14 affected persons were recently re-tested using the method. Results are now negative on all. This is to request you to advise the volags concerned and where applicable re-confirm assurances or re-activate the old cases. The cases are as follows: - (1) Re-activate the old cases where PAS were affected. (i) FOIA (b)(6) (ii) (iii) (iv) (2) Re-activate the old case where a dependant had been denied and case has not departed. (i) FOIA (b) (6) USCC - re-instate FOIA (b)(6) to the case.
